website_summaries.verdict: A more mud/off-road-oriented tire that will provide better traction than typical touring or all-terrain options.
pros: Uses a thicker, more pronounced tread pattern with extra support on the shoulder lugs
Treads penetrate deeper into wet mud, creating more traction in slippery conditions
Aggressive shoulder lugs protect against hazards
cons: Tire can start to bulge in areas after months of general use

customer_reviews.title: These are great plow truck tires
customer_reviews.text: Got 4 of these shipped to my mechanics shop and final total was $810.00 The last 4 of a high end brand cost me almost 1500.00 Tread is awesome and road noise is 8 out of 10 being best. These things really dig in deep snow and push like hell. Cant wait till spring so I can try them off road and in the mud. Unless something stupid happens these are my new go to tire.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby G

customer_reviews.title: 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 Stock 20 inch rim, LOOKS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: Got them today, they look pretty damn awesome, the tire look aggressive. M/T suppose to be noisy, but this one doesn't make that much noise, it might pick up sound from 60 mph +.
customer_reviews.author: Luke Tran

customer_reviews.title: Best tire for your money!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tire! If your on edge of getting these or getting something else, save your money and get these. These tires ride smooth, and have minimal road noise compared to other mud tires. Federal>nitto
customer_reviews.author: Jarred Marion

customer_reviews.title: love how they look
customer_reviews.text: Went back to these after using Nitto trail grapplers twice and Mickey thompson ATZ's. Honestly can't beat them for the price out the door at around 800 after getting them mounted (about half the price of higher end tires)., love how they look, pretty quiet for a m/t just a low volume hum on the highway barely notice it. I was skeptical but I have no complaints to this point I will update when I get some more miles on them.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Great looking tires
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tires. Had them on for about 1,200 miles now. Doing great. Performs well in mud and dirt. Can agree that at low speeds you do kinda "feel" the tread. Of course the are louder than normal tires because they are M/Ts. Only complaint is that they suck in the rain, grip is very low in rain. But other than that awesome tires so far I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mike ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of these tires. They had a little road noise. Got about 10,000 miles on them now and they are unbearable to drive down the road. Crazy loud and they vibrate the whole truck at low speeds. They cupped horrible. It's a new truck. Had the alignment checked at two different places. It's just the tires. Going back to nitto tires. I would never buy these again
customer_reviews.author: ed

customer_reviews.title: Get a pair, maybe a second at this price and quality...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. Great wear. I've had them for over a year, there not loud.. LOKKS ARE GREAT. Get complimented all the time. No one believes I ordered let alone paid as little as I did... My truck is my daily driver. I live in Montana where we get every element available... I'll be back....
customer_reviews.author: SAPPER FOR LIFE: FAMILY MAN FOR ETERNITY AND A DAY...

customer_reviews.title: Will buy these again forsure!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these off of reviews, and I love them. I live in North Dakota and we have 6 months of snow and ice. They do very well on ice and amazing in deep snow. These tires look mean on my pickup. They are a little noisy, but only to be expected for the size of the lugs.
customer_reviews.author: darby j plath

customer_reviews.title: Missing 3/8” of tread
customer_reviews.text: Tires are ok. However the description is misleading and inaccurate. It says 32.8/32nds of tread depth mine are only 20/32nds. I was a little upset when I realized my new tires were missing 3/8” of the tread.
customer_reviews.author: James Clinton

customer_reviews.title: Super fast Shipping
customer_reviews.text: Super fast Shipping,this is the second set of these tires I have bought. They are a great tire for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Darrick Ness

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I love this tire. And for the price there awesome. I have abused these tires. Not rotated properly, burnouts and I had a ball joint go bad and didn't replace tell I had uneven tread and also had a wheel bearing go out that caused uneven tread wear. And even after all that the tire has 28,946 miles on this set. Iv got another set ordered and ready to go on just waiting to get over 30,000 I drive a 05 dodge ram 1500 5.7 2wd with 20x10 rims 33/12.5/20
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Lehman

customer_reviews.title: They are not loud at all
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price not sure about the mileage but didn’t buy them for driving on the highway all the time. I’ve used in about 3 to 4 feet of snow and didn’t even spin, on ice the are not the best but I have had worse. Love the look they have going on with the aggressiveness, and they do fix on a stock ram with no lift and only rub with you are at a good bind with the suspension, normal driving they are great.. 33x13.5r20 with the rim being a 9” inch with people said that they couldn’t be mounted, but they did in fact fit. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Got these tires for the first time in December 2015 and just had to replace them. Front tires went about bald but back tires were still fine. If I would’ve rotated them more consistently, they would’ve lasted another 6 months-1 year. Tires drive very well, not too much road noise, and look very cool and aggressive. 10/10 would recommend. Also, the seller got them delivered a day earlier than expected. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Barrett Wells

customer_reviews.title: Ended up not using them. Couldn’t return due to shipping cost.
customer_reviews.text: Ended up not using the tires. Went with a different brand. Tried to return them, but couldn’t due to return shipping costing so much. Wasn’t worth it in the end. So I have 4 useless tires. And I’m out hundreds of dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer Quiggle

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the price, mounted them with on my 2013 FX4 after adding a leveling kit, no problems. Drove across the US from NC to CA and have had 0 issues!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Rahmer

customer_reviews.title: Decent tire, good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires because they were cheap and I couldn’t go with a street tire. I’ve had these tires before and I liked them then got a little older and realized I didn’t need mud tires on a daily, but they were cheap and I needed tires so I got them again. They are a little noises but not too bad I’ve only had them on for a couple days but I expect them to last awhile. Just have to rotate them a little more often than an all terrain or street tire.
customer_reviews.author: B1992

customer_reviews.title: Had these on for a while now the wear patter on them is awesome
customer_reviews.text: would recommend I've had these on for a while now used on roads and some off road and I'm impressed with how well the wear on them is, I would recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Noe B

customer_reviews.title: 1 year real Life review
customer_reviews.text: This is a one-year review, I am really impressed with the tires, I have approximately 8000 Miles on the tires at the moment, I rotate them with every oil change 5K ,great all-weather tire, very little road noise , and I love it's beefy aggressive appearance. These tires can last a long time if you regularly rotate them, and of course that goes for any tire but especially mud tires and all terrain tires.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUNK
customer_reviews.text: junk wouldn’t balance out, ride horrible. incredibly loud. seller and amazon did nothing of the issues either so good luck. might be okay if you never plan on actually driving on the road
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: But this tire looks GREAT on my lifted truck
customer_reviews.text: I just switched out all of mine. But this tire looks GREAT on my lifted truck. The tread is wonderful and I'm overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Love the new tires look great feels awesome for me they not that loud of road noise for me just my opinion. Will definitely be buying more when it's time for new ones. Will probably try 35's next time. Great tire for the money
customer_reviews.author: Chilo P£R£Z

customer_reviews.title: Great tire bad install experience.
customer_reviews.text: Tire is great. I’d order again but wish Amazon would partner with other installers. The Pep Boys in my area has to be one of the worst stores around.
customer_reviews.author: S Dewayne Crable

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!! Love em!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tires look beefy and drive good. No rubbing/scrubbung during turns on stock height truck which is a win. They feel a little "Floaty" at 80 mph but rides great at 70 mph. Will buy again when i need them. Will update if issues occur.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Padgett

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: The tires are awful they do not last will not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for the right price !
customer_reviews.text: Second time using this tires . I’m very satisfied with my purchase thru prime . 2 day delivery . Love the the price , love the look of the tire , love the feeling , some noise but not bad at all .....leveled silverado on 33x12.50r20 mud tires & wheels are 20x9 with no rub on tight turns Maybe a slight rub on a U -turn but nothing to worry about . Defenatly will continue to buy this tires .
customer_reviews.author: Diego

customer_reviews.title: This is your next tire.
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical because of the price being $100 cheaper than other tires the same size, but they look like new after 3k miles on my 2019 Ram 1500. Will definitely purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Bracedogg

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: 1000 miles on them. So far so good. Like them alot. Balanced perfect. Little loud but im ok with it. Kinda wanted that.
customer_reviews.author: Jc James

customer_reviews.title: they are much heavier than stated
customer_reviews.text: So im had these for a month. grip dry is great. wet is ok traction control kicks in. off road they have been great. problem for me is they weigh in at 65lbs. but it said 45lbs. the other problem has been balancing. last but not least more road noise than expected.
customer_reviews.author: REID

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: 3rd set in 10 years.. they last forever, look great, and ride smooth..
customer_reviews.author: Nick Moore

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THE LOOK AND THE RIDE IS INCREDIBLE... TAKES A DAY OR TO TO BREAK THE TRES IN.. BUT ONCE YOU DO THE RIDE IS PERFECT.. MAKES THE JEEP FEEL LIKE A MOON PATROL TANKER WITH A LOT OF MUSCLE....
customer_reviews.author: Rachid

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for the price. Fast shipping, would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Jason C

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great price and good quality tires. Look great on my truck
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: QUIET-flawless balance- FAST SHIPPING AND PRICE IS SUPERB
customer_reviews.text: Great ride! Balanced perfectly! Road forced perfect, QUIET for such aggressive lugs on tire, and when i say quiet i mean ot, maybe 5-10% louder than a regular tire, just blown away with the tires...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I have these on my f150. I have put 40,000 miles on them so far. For the price they were so worth it. Looking to purchase new tires soon though as these are starting to get stress cracks in them. They are very noisy, but that just comes with their aggressive look. Considering buying these again!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Cochran

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for Road use
customer_reviews.text: After having these tires installed the ride on my F150 pickup was so bad that I had to change the tires. I do not recommend these for Highway use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott E.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Had the tires installed two weeks ago so don’t know how the hold up butt they look great and the ride is good. Surprisingly quite very happy so far
customer_reviews.author: Fredbo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tires
customer_reviews.text: Installed and tires balanced perfectly as we all know some MT's do and some dont. These look amazing and perform just the same. Not to loud not to quiet. Love the look, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Good price on these tires!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking set of tires. A little on the noisy side , but not horrible. Have about 500 miles on them and no sign of wear yet. Haven't taken an offroad trip yet, but sure it will be fun with the tread! My 2011 silverado looks great with 3 inch leveling kit and these tires!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Esquivel

customer_reviews.title: amazing value
customer_reviews.text: this is my second set on my Ford F150 I drive a lot the first set I got almost 50,000 miles in this set is approaching 50,000 miles I rotate them every 5000/6000 miles and they do great, I thought they were a little loud at first but quickly got used to it,
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: Tires for mud not highway
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tires for my 2013 Chevy 2500 and drove for a month and the belts started to break. Probably a good tire for prairie driving but not highway use.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Steffen

customer_reviews.title: Look great, sound great.
customer_reviews.text: Look great, sound great. I was so afraid they would roar. They are louder than my A/T but I can live with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stretchman75

customer_reviews.title: Rough riding tires
customer_reviews.text: Look good and ride well up until about 60mph and it’ll get bumpy, tried many different psi and could not get them to smooth out. Didn’t expect a perfect ride being a mud tire but I would spend the extra money and get a better made brand. Bought a set of Nittos
customer_reviews.author: Austin K

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: A bit noisey, but it’s a mud tire. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great mud tire for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Got almost 60,000 miles out of these tires!! Well worth the money, very quiet on road till about 5/32 of tread left then they are quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: No way to contact seller! Dont buy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase 4 tires. They didnt work out. So I return them and they only refunded me for 2 tires and there is no way to contact the seller. Its bullcrap!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meaty tires
customer_reviews.text: Real meaty looking tires. Haven’t had problems with separating or anything like people say they do. Tires shops knock them because they can’t sell them this cheap.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Just short of amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely next best mud tire out! Look and drive great!
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Great price great tire
customer_reviews.text: Ride great, not much noise, exactly what I need for a super great price
customer_reviews.author: Melisa Keener

customer_reviews.title: Affordable MT
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the price, just bought my second set. The first set lasted me 4 years and almost 60kmiles. Had to replaced because I hit a few pot holes and the belts shifted, but it was time anyway to replace them. Can’t go wrong with these!!
customer_reviews.author: Milt

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Put this on my stock 2014 ram with 1” spacers. Fits great and looks great! Noisier than the factory tires, but I wanted it !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Tires
customer_reviews.text: These tires are awesome, way better condition than we anticipated. They drive through the mud on our clay road like it is on dry pavement. Very little road noise. Great value, super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Ball

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tires.
customer_reviews.text: I put them on a 2007 Chevy Silverado crew cub. Has a 6” suspension lift. They look good, ride good and not too much road noise.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will be getting more when the time comes.
customer_reviews.text: My first time getting these style tires and i must say I like them and the road noise isn't bad at i like it...
customer_reviews.author: Amos Moore

customer_reviews.title: Buy them!!
customer_reviews.text: High recommend these tires to people that want aggressive tires but don’t want to spend a lot of money. Definitely the best bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Todd Deal

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm running a 33x12.50x20 on my 2008 Silverado and love look. The tires are not to loud on the highway and perform great off-road. I will be purchasing another set once those wear out..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great low price tires!
customer_reviews.text: Had these on my daily jeep Wrangler when I bought it, so I bought them again and loving them even more.
customer_reviews.author: infinityLi0n

customer_reviews.title: Good tires!!! But they are loud!!!
customer_reviews.text: Good tires so far. They are loud! But you’ll have that with any mud tire!!
customer_reviews.author: Chris F

customer_reviews.title: Tire shake!!
customer_reviews.text: Tires are very aggressive, lots of road noise but expected from a mt, cons won’t balance have tire shake from 55-65 mph other than that good tire seems to not be wearing much

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires. Been buying them for years for both our trucks. Tread is perfect and they last a while.
customer_reviews.author: Levi campbell

customer_reviews.title: Have lasted solo long 5 years
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered a new set of the same ones after owning them for 5 years put lots of miles on them seems like they just never wore out

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking tires haven't had them long will update later on down the road.

customer_reviews.title: Bad Azz tires!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and the hum it has cruising down the highway!

customer_reviews.title: Step up your game... grandpa ride into a awesome ride!!
customer_reviews.text: For the money how could you say no! Holding up great and get compliments every where I go about the look!
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Amazing tire
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had then on my truck for 2 years now. Hands down the best value for a m/t. I’ve put around 20,000 miles on them. Still have around 70% life left.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler drain

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Aggressive looking tires. They don't make to much noise like other brands or style tires. I like them and I will buy them again

customer_reviews.title: Loud and weak looking
customer_reviews.text: The look okay just small for my truck. Not as aggressive as I would have liked.

customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Road noise equal to my A/T tires I had before. 2004 Dodge Ram 1500 not even close to rubbing at full lock.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great tire, mildly loud, but i didnt expect it to be quiet like an H/T. great traction, no complaints

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth riding tires. Awesome will definitely buy again and highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.title: Great tire
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd set. I have gotten 40,000 miles each from the previous tires, because I rotate them. Not too bad noisy.

customer_reviews.title: Take you're tires to you're owen tire shop to have installed

customer_reviews.text: 23k on them plenty of tread left just get them rotated with every oil change

customer_reviews.text: Great looking tires but loud noise unless you have an exhaust system that will drown it out.

I am not sure if they switched a manufacturer since I had purchased these but im pretty sure I read that somewhere and I'm sure it was because of this flaw

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.text: Rotate every 2500-3k miles and keep pressure around 55psi, you wont have any problems!

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this tire. I can’t believe any positive review on these tires. They just didn’t wait long enough to review them. No warranty on them. I’ve replaced two new ones due to belt separation and the replacements did the same thing within 5000 miles. Our local 4wd center told me all his suppliers quit selling these tires.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for the price. Typical M/T noise but not overly loud. Will purchase them again when needed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: Tires are great . Lot of people starting to ask about them .

customer_reviews.text: Purchased these at a good price only downside is a little road noise. Great purchase overall.

Currently have 15000 miles with about 95% tread left.. keep on a good rotation schedule with every oil change and they are great.

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 4 all defective. Still waiting on replacements
customer_reviews.text: Shipping took way too long. Was sent 4 defective tires. None of them will hold balance and are out of round.Have yet to receive 4 new replacements. Hoping they are not defective as well. Only upside is they look good. But that's pointless web the tires are junk. Should have stuck with something from Cooper.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Amazon for a cheap price not product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires! Arrived very quick. Four brand new tires for under a grand.

product_meta.title: Federal Couragia M/T | Off Road/Mud Terrain Tire | 33 x 12.50R20
product_meta.description: The Federal Couragia M/T has a rugged off-road performance and a confident look. With unprecedented traction, grip and strength this tire competes in every category, and with its aggressive tread design was engineered to clear out easily and create a constant performance range. The Couragia M/T's aggressive block and shoulder offer great dirt traction and rock crawling ability, along with mud and gravel slinging happiness. Be assured, the Federal ultimate off-road Couragia M/T has been designed to conquer.
feature_bullets: Your purchase includes One Federal Couragia M/T Tire – 33 x 12.50R20
Tire dimensions: Overall diameter – 32.8” | Section Width – 12.3” | Weight – 63.49 lbs. | Max load – 2600 lbs. | Load Range – E
Rims specifications: Standard Rim – 10” | Approved Rim width – 9.5”-10.5”
Reinforced compounds contribute to exceptional durability against cuts, chips and abrasions
Aggressive tread design and strengthened shoulder deliver excellent traction and protection from off-road impact

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars353 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
